short_summary: Avis de réquisition du n° VE25 -Tente 20 pièces
full_summary:
## [English]: "Contract Title:">

## Tent
### Publication Details:
- **Reference Number:** cb-6987-29567629
- ** Amendment Number:** 2
- **Solicitation Number:** W8485-247753/A
- **Publication Date:** 2023-07-05
- **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-08-15T14:00:00 (Expired)
- **Amendment Date:** 2023-08-15

## Description:
The Canadian Department of National Defence is implementing a procurement for the supply of 20 Tents (GSIN: 8340) to meet the needs of various Defence Acquisition Groups in Canada. The procurement details and documents can be found online via the Canada Buys platform.

## Submission Information:
- **Procurement Category:** Government of Canada (GD)
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
- **Limited Tendering Reason:** None
- **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Contact Information:
-  **Name:** Dany Lebel
-  **Email:** [dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca](mailto:dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca)
-  **Phone:** (000) 000-0000

## Documentation:
- The full procurement notice and technical documentation in English and French can be downloaded from the [Canada Buys website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6987/w8485-247753---bid-solicitation-en-pdf.pdf) and [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6987/w8485-247753---bid-solicitation-fr-pdf.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6987/w8485-247753---bid-solicitation-fr-pdf.pdf).
